name: Fast Racer
description:
Fast Racer is a multiplayer action racing shooter with powerups.

This game is still in development, but you can test it in early access.

If you have ideas to improve the game please write us in our discussion board.

Controls:

W: Drive forward.

S: Drive backward.

A: Steer left.

D: Steer right.

E: Use powerup.

Space: Shoot.

You can hold the Space key to charge a shot.
